wikimediaeditortasks-desc: Task generation, storage, and API service for microcontributions. Supports the [[:mw:Android_editing_features|App Editor Tasks]] project of the [[:mw:Wikimedia_Apps|Wikimedia Apps]] team.
apihelp-query+wikimediaeditortaskscounts: Feature-specific editing statistics for the logged-in user.
Get task-specific counts and targets passed for the logged-in user.
